But here's the craziest part: The agent doesn't just write the thread. It gives me a full growth playbook AFTER. Personalized recommendations: - Growth tactics (Exact actions for first 2 hours) - Best time to post (based on my PST + audience) - Key metrics to track https://t.co/gmLZ9HGTDo

The meta moment: To test it, I asked: "Write a thread about how I built you." You're reading that result right now! üòé The agent understood the full process, why each step mattered, and how to make it valuable. It work. 7/9

Step 5: Creating the final agent Compressed everything into one master prompt. Loaded into Claude Projects as custom instructions. Now when I say "create thread about X": Agent suggests thread type ‚Üí generates 5 hooks ‚Üí writes full 6-8 post thread ‚Üí optimized for my exact

Step 4: Iteration hell First version? Broken. Wrong assumptions. Second version? Better. Still off on timing strategy. Third version? Close. Audience targeting issues. Version 4 finally worked. Each rebuild: - Found new errors - Refined instructions - Added missing

Step 3: Building the instruction set This took 3+ hours. The longest part. I documented everything: - Cold start strategy - 2026 thread structures - My niche - Tone of voice rules - Target audience psychology - Optimal posting times Result: 19 pages of dense https://t.co/4g4Jxpjwr1

Step 2: Cross-validation with Claude I don't trust single-source answers. Took Grok's insights ‚Üí fed to Claude (Sonnet 4.5 Extended Thinking) Made Claude research the same questions independently. Then: "Analyze both answers. Synthesize the truth." Two LLMs checking each

Step 1: Research with Grok (4.1 Thinking) Why Grok? It lives on X. Knows the platform better than anyone. Asked: "What makes threads go viral in 2025-2026?" Got raw data: hook structures, timing, formatting, engagement triggers. No theory. Pure platform intelligence. 2/9
